I am a Rose Postdoctoral Fellow at the [Cornell Lab of Ornithology](https://www.birds.cornell.edu/home/). My current focus is on using available data sources including participatory science to conduct research on the design and implementation of dynamic conservation programs [More about me.](about.html)

Starting July 1 2025 I will be an Assistant Professor in Quantitative Ecology at the [University of Manitoba](https://umanitoba.ca/). If you are interested in collaboration or graduate/post-doc opportunities please reach out! 

Email: adb299@cornell.edu
